document_data.name: ''Key of the Ancients''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''Key of the Ancients''''' was a [[magic]]al [[circlet]] that originated from the [[Emerald Grove]].
document_data.Description: The circlet was created from partly-fossilised branches taken from trees grown in the Emerald Grove. Several small [[rubies]] were embedded in its from, which were uniquely connected to the stones that formed the foundation of the enclave.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of ''Key of the Ancients'' garnered a greater understanding of the natural world.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Nettie]], the apprentice healer of [[archdruid]] Master [[Halsin]].
* [[Findal]], an unlucky druid of the Emerald Grove, captured by the [[goblin]]s of the [[Cult of the Absolute]].
